title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Grounding GenAI on Enterprise Data with AWS AgentCore + Coveo (MAM221)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS AgentCore + Coveo 在企业数据上构建生成式AI基础 (MAM221)
abstract: Building chatbots and GenAI experiences for regulated industries like healthcare and financial services requires more than a prompt and an LLM. It demands an architecture that enforces data access control, auditability, and precision—at scale. In this technical session, we’ll walk through how large corporations design and deploy secure, high-performing agentic chat experiences using AWS AgentCore and Coveo’s Retrieval APIs. We’ll also cover lessons learned from real-world deployments—including how teams across healthcare organizations and global banks are using this architecture to support high-confidence GenAI workflows for patients, advisors, and support agents. This presentation is brought to you by Coveo, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 为受监管行业（如医疗保健和金融服务）构建聊天机器人和生成式AI体验不仅仅需要提示词和大语言模型。它需要一个能够强制执行数据访问控制、可审计性和精确性的架构——并且能够大规模运行。在这个技术会议中，我们将演示大型企业如何使用AWS AgentCore和Coveo的检索API来设计和部署安全、高性能的智能体聊天体验。我们还将分享从实际部署中获得的经验教训——包括医疗保健组织和全球银行的团队如何使用这种架构来为患者、顾问和支持代理提供高可信度的生成式AI工作流程。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Coveo提供。
